trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked set [number v] to [0] ask [Enter a number:] and wait set [number v] to (answer) if <(number) < [0]> then set [number v] to ((-1) * (number)) end repeat until <<(number) = [0]> or <(number) = [1]>> change [number v] by (-2) end if <(number) = [0]> then say [You entered an even number!] end if <(number) = [1]> then say [You entered an odd number!] end
